title: European Public Relations Education and Research Association
text:
The European Public Relations Education and Research Association (EUPRERA) is an organization working to promote and combine <a href="research">research</a> and practice within the field of <a href="public%20relations">public relations</a> in <a href="Europe">Europe</a>.
It organizes and promotes various <a href="academic%20conference">conferences</a>, including an annual <a href="congress">congress</a> and a spring symposium, held in collaboration with selected universities across Europe, as well as the annual <a href="International%20Bled%20Symposium">International Bled Symposium</a> in <a href="Bled">Bled</a>, <a href="Slovenia">Slovenia</a>.
